subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Covering the court like a tarp, Serena Williams suffocated top-seeded Maria Sharapova in 58 bloodless minutes Tuesday in the fourth round of the Sony Ericsson Open.
snippet: Covering the court like a tarp, Serena Williams suffocated top-seeded Maria Sharapova in 58 bloodless minutes Tuesday in the fourth round of the Sony Ericsson Open.
